overview: Music & Musicals, Music Lessons, Guitar & Banjo Lessons - You'll learn the secrets to producing an authentic metal sound with this step-by-step instructional program led by guitarist Tommy Bolan of the bands Warlock, N.Y.C. and Freight Train Jane. Segments start with warm-up exercises and then move on to speed techniques, scales, harmonics, string skipping, pendulum picking, arpeggios and tremolo tricks. Features include on-screen tablature, gear demonstrations and an interactive lesson library.
title: Tommy Bolan: Metal Primer
